refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: gm=geomean(x) gm=geomean(x,'r')(or, equivalently, gm=geomean(x,1)) gm=geomean(x,'c')(or, equivalently, gm=geomean(x,2))

listitem.para: real or complex vector or matrix

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function computes the geometric mean of a vector or matrix x. For a vector or matrix x, gm=geomean(x) returns in scalar gm the geometric mean of all the entries of x.
gm=geomean(x,'r') (or, equivalently, gm=gmean(x,1) ) returns in each entry of the row vector gm the geometric mean of each column of x.
gm=geomean(x,'c') (or, equivalently, gm=gmean(x,2) ) returns in each entry of the column vector gm the geometric mean of each row of x .
